text: 8.41 The town centres serve a vital function in the wider community, with each offering a diverse and varied selection of amenities. The bustling markets in Whitechapel, Chrisp Street, Roman Road, Columbia Road, and Petticoat Lane provide a unique shopping experience. Meanwhile, Spitalfields, Redchurch Street, Brick Lane, Canary Wharf, Hackney Wick, Whitechapel, Cambridge Heath, Columbia Road, and Bethnal Green offer a thriving night-time economy. Canary Wharf is home to a range of retail, leisure, and community offers, and the borough also has a growing arts and cultural scene, which includes galleries, museums, cinemas, theatres, studios, and drinking establishments.
